text:
A structure like this:

<fo:block>
	<fo:external-graphic/>
	<fo:block>
		Foo 
	</fo:block>
	<fo:block>
		Bar 
	</fo:block>
</fo:block>

Produces output like this:

*image*
Foo
*image*
Bar
*image*
creator: brook@mootkat.com
